articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Grant Bradburn confirmed as Pakistan men's head coach for next two years - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Former South Africa cricketer Andrew Puttick has also signed a two-year contract as the batting coach
articles.content: Grant Bradburn had held the position on a consultancy basis during the New Zealand series  •  Peter Della Penna
